text: alɔ sɛrɛxɛ taami, sansi xɔri naxee bama sɛrɛxɛ ra lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ, sɛrɛxɛ gan daaxi naxee bama lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ, naxee bama malabui lɔxɔɛe, naxee bama kike nɛɛnɛ ti lɔxɔɛe, naxee bama sali lɔxɔɛe, naxee bama sɛniyɛnyi xa fe ra, naxee bama Isirayila xa yunubi xafarife ra, a nun wali naxan birin nabama muxu Marigi Ala xa banxi kui.»
